conversion_verification.notes: True 3D isometric cutaway successfully generated with clear structural depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clear wall thicknesses and perceivable volumes. Perspective is clean and consistent.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly faithful layout; all rooms, partitions, and wall segments align precisely with the 2D source. Door transitions are accurately placed.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement captures the specific layout of the 2D plan, including kitchen counters, bathroom fixtures, and living room orientations.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering, consistent materials (blue tiles for bathrooms), and solid lighting. Minimal deduction for minor soft shadows on small details.

detected_errors.description: Minor height/scale variations in some internal window sill cutouts compared to others.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and geometrically accurate 3D translation that preserves every architectural detail from the 2D floor plan.
